original_text: It was carved of cherubim and palm trees, a palm tree between cherub and cherub. Every cherub had two faces:
korean_text: 널판자에는 그룹들과 종려나무를 새겼는데 두 그룹 사이에 종려나무 한 그루가 있으며 각 그룹에 두 얼굴이 있으니

sentences.original_text: It was carved of cherubim and palm trees
a palm tree between cherub and cherub.

sentences.korean_translation: 모든 그룹은 두 얼굴을 가지고 있었습니다
